name: B-GUEST
overview: B-GUEST is an on-line real time event confirmation system over traditional PSTN or mobile networks. B-GUEST allows sending your own personal voice message directly to your event guests phones and collecting their responses in real-time. The system allows you to manage your guest list over your personal web page and save money due to guest list accuracy. B-GUEST is the first fully automated system that allows a non-human yet personalize confirmation.
